programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind: that a comet will destroy the planet in one year's time, unless a risky joint US-Russian outer-space mission can deflect it(n)

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old US soldier named Billy Lynn and his company fight in a horrific battle in Iraq, and soon return to the States for a promotional tour involving a military celebration during an American football game(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Training Day director Antoine Fuqua takes viewers on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation, loyalty, and duty while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie Dugan (Richard Gere) is days away from retirement, but he's been burnt-out for years. Unable to remember why he signed up for the job in the first place, all Eddie can think about is retreating to his fishing cabin in Connecticut, and forgetting the horrors that he's seen during his decades on the job. At the same time, undercover narcotics cop Clarence "Tango" Butler (Don Cheadle) is right in the thick of it. As hard as he tries to quit, however, his superiors always find a way of keeping him on the job. Much like Dugan, he's lost sight of his priorities, and these days Tango's loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. And Tango isn't the only cop who's being drawn to the dark side of the law; narcotics officer Sal Procida's (Ethan Hawke) wife is currently pregnant with twins, and he's barely making enough to keep his family afloat. When Sal learns that his wife is at risk of losing their unborn children, desperation drives him to consider unethical means of ensuring financial stability. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene as the NYPD attempts to clean up the BK projects, the epicenter of lawlessness in the highest-crime precinct(n)

programme.title: Making a Killing: Guns, Greed, and the NRA
programme.desc: A study of the impact of gun sales in the United States(n)

programme.title: Sleuth
programme.desc: Faulty remake of the Broadway hit involving deadly cat-and-mouse games between a writer (Michael Caine) and his wife's lover (Jude Law)(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: The Rolling Stones Havana Moon
programme.desc: A chronicle of the Rolling Stones' tour through Latin America is highlighted by their free concert in Havana(n)

programme.title: The Rolling Stones Olé Olé Olé: A Trip Across Latin America
programme.desc: This documentary follows the Rolling Stones during a 2016 tour of Latin America, which ends with a massive concert in Havana—their first time ever performing in Cuba(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialize in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: A black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Sleuth
programme.desc: Faulty remake of the Broadway hit involving deadly cat-and-mouse games between a writer (Michael Caine) and his wife's lover (Jude Law)(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: After making a striking directorial debut with her screen adaptation of The Virgin Suicides, Sofia Coppola offers a story of love and friendship blooming under unlikely circumstances in this comedy drama. Bob Harris (Bill Murray) is a well-known American actor whose career has gone into a tailspin; needing work, he takes a very large fee to appear in a commercial for Japanese whiskey to be shot in Tokyo. Feeling no small degree of culture shock in Japan, Bob spends most of his non-working hours at his hotel, where he meets Charlotte (Scarlett Johansson) at the bar. Twentysomething Charlotte is married to John (Giovanni Ribisi), a successful photographer who is in Tokyo on an assignment, leaving her to while away her time while he works. Beyond their shared bemusement and confusion with the sights and sounds of contemporary Tokyo, Bob and Charlotte share a similar dissatisfaction with their lives; the spark has gone out of Bob's marriage, and he's become disillusioned with his career. Meanwhile, Charlotte is puzzled with how much John has changed in their two years of marriage, while she's been unable to launch a creative career of her own. Bob and Charlotte become fast friends, and as they explore Tokyo, they begin to wonder if their sudden friendship might be growing into something more(n)

programme.title: Oscar and Lucinda
programme.desc: Eccentric Australian love story about a preacher with a gambling addiction and his love for a beautiful heiress with a mutual love for playing games at high stakes. Ralph Fiennes, Cate Blanchett, Ciaran Hinds, Tom Wilkinson, Richard Roxburgh, Clive Russell, Bille Brown, Josephine Byrnes, Barnaby Kay, Barry Otto, Linda Bassett, Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy from Woody Allen, nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Ageing lothario Don sets out on a quest to find his old girlfriends, after he receives an anonymous letter claiming that he has a 19-year-old son. Comedy drama which won the Grand Jury prize at Cannes(n)

programme.title: Rio, I Love You
programme.desc: Another installment of the Cities of Love franchise, this anthology film depicts romantic encounters in different neighborhoods of Rio de Janeiro. In all, ten shorts helmed by celebrated directors are woven together to spin a tale of love in "the Marvelous City." Directors include Fernando Meirelles, José Padilha, Paolo Sorrentino, and John Turturro. Vincent Cassel, Harvey Keitel, Emily Mortimer, Vanessa Paradis, and Wagner Moura star in the various segments(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: The Young Victoria
programme.desc: Queen Victoria deals with turbulent 19th-century politics while coping with societal pressure to marry someone other than her true love, Prince Albert(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy from Woody Allen, nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. He struggles with daily routines and his relatives intend to take Katie away, but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Ageing lothario Don sets out on a quest to find his old girlfriends, after he receives an anonymous letter claiming that he has a 19-year-old son. Comedy drama which won the Grand Jury prize at Cannes(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: After making a striking directorial debut with her screen adaptation of The Virgin Suicides, Sofia Coppola offers a story of love and friendship blooming under unlikely circumstances in this comedy drama. Bob Harris (Bill Murray) is a well-known American actor whose career has gone into a tailspin; needing work, he takes a very large fee to appear in a commercial for Japanese whiskey to be shot in Tokyo. Bob and Charlotte become fast friends, and as they explore Tokyo, they begin to wonder if their sudden friendship might be growing into something more(n)

programme.title: Basquiat
programme.desc: An unusual film examining the turbulent life of noted postmodern artist Jean-Michel Basquiat, from his first graffiti works as 'Samo,' his collaborations with Andy Warhol in the 1980s, and his tragic death from a heroin overdose. Jeffrey Wright, David Bowie, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Michael Wincott, Claire Forlani, Benicio Del Toro, Courtney Love, Julian Schnabel(n)

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: A socially inept young woman slowly learns to overcome her insecurities in this sleeper hit from Australia. The unconventional Muriel (Toni Collette) is deeply unsatisfied with her life, stuck in the nowhere town of Porpoise Spit and feeling rejected by her friends and family. Believing herself unattractive and worthless, she seeks meager solace in ABBA songs and fantasies of gorgeous weddings, with herself as the bride. Muriel's life takes a turn for the better, however, when she befriends the carefree Rhonda (Rachel Griffiths), who encourages her to take control of her life. Together, the two women travel to Sydney, where a series of liberating experiences help Muriel develop self-esteem and take the first steps towards maturity(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent has an epiphany of conscience and is fired after he puts out a memo stating that he believes everyone in his firm should care more about their clients than the money they make(n)

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: A homeless woman parks her van in the driveway of playwright Alan Bennett's house and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Mike Myers and Dana Carvey star as Wayne Campbell and Garth Agar, lifelong friends who present their own cult cable show, Wayne's World, from a basement. Such is their success, slimy TV executive Ben Oliver plans to buy their show and turn it into a product-placement special. And to complicate matters, both Wayne and Oliver have fallen for foxy singer Cassandra. Based on characters first seen on Saturday Night Live, Myers' script and Penelope Spheeris' direction created an unlikely comedy, which sees the nerds inherit the earth as well as giving rise to a whole host of catchphrases(n)

programme.title: Grandma's Boy
programme.desc: Can the world's oldest adolescent maintain his cool while living with his grandmother? Alex (Allen Covert) is a 35-year-old video-game fanatic who gave up a career in accounting to take a job testing games for Brainasium, the company behind the wildly popular game "Eternal Death Slayer." While Alex took a big pay cut to land his dream job, he's happy with his work and is making ends meet -- until he discovers that his roommate hasn't paid the rent for the last six months, using the money to finance repeated visits to a local massage parlor. After running out of friends who will let him sleep on their couch, Alex swallows his pride and moves in with his grandma Lily (Doris Roberts), who loves Alex and is happy to give him a place to stay in exchange for doing chores around the house. Lily shares her home with two friends, perpetually confused Bea (Shirley Knight) and sexually adventurous Grace (Shirley Jones), and between the three of them, there's always work to be done, keeping Alex busy nearly every night. While Alex tells his co-workers he's living with three attractive women who are running him ragged, they don't know the real story; in the meantime, Alex is trying to charm Brainasium's beautiful new executive, Samantha (Linda Cardellini), while butting heads with the firm's space-case CEO Cheezle (Kevin Nealon) and J.P. (Joel David Moore), a teenage game designer who is no longer in touch with reality. Grandma's Boy was the first feature film from director Nicholaus Goossen(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Postcards From The Edge is about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of a very surreal place - hollywood. The film follows Suzanne Vale (Merrill Streep), an actress who struggles to rebuild her life after a stint in a drug rehabilitation clinic following a near fatal overdose. Upon her release from rehab Suzanne is dismayed to learn that because of her history of drug use and the undependable track record that resulted, the only way she can be hired for a film she is anxious to do is if a "responsible party" agrees to house and supervise her for the duration of the movie's shooting schedule. For Suzanne this requires moving back into the Beverly Hills home of her mother, Doris Mann(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two moronic brothers try to make an impact at the hippest joint in town(n)

programme.title: Gina Yashere: Laughing to America
programme.desc: A stand-up set by Gina Yashere(n)

programme.title: Whiteboys
programme.desc: Danny Hoch brings down da house as a rap-happy white Iowan who longs to move---along with his equally white posse (Dash Mihok, Mark Webber)---to a notoriously dangerous Chicago project, where he hopes to make a name for himself as a gangsta-rap star. Although the boy'z are from the heartland, he claims he's "still got the ghetto in my heart." Rappers Snoop Doggy Dogg and Dr. Dre have cameos. Piper Perabo, Eugene Byrd(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Distinguished by a sharp, witty dialogue between its two cop protagonists, Ray and Danny (Gregory Hines and Billy Crystal), this entertaining crime drama is well worth a visit. Ray and Danny are nearly blown away by super bad guy Julio (Jimmy Smits), and their boss is peeved at them as usual. So the two are given a holiday from their beat in Chicago and travel to the sunny shores of Key West. They like it enough to retire from police work and open a business there. But when the duo returns to the Windy City, Julio is about to pull off a big drug deal and retirement may not be such a good idea(n)

programme.title: Kiss Me Goodbye
programme.desc: Sally Field stars in this romantic comedy as a widow on the verge of re-marrying when the spirit of her late husband re-appears(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Bobby Bowfinger, a would-be movie producer and charlatan who desperately needs a hit film to repay his debts. Bringing together a cast of oddballs, he dupes superstar actor Eddie Murphy into starring in his low-budget picture. Sharp comedy, with an experienced cast including Heather Graham(n)

Expecting his mischievous sibling to be something of a liability during his campaign, the aspiring politician orders one of his aides to keep him out of the public eye - a task he does not relish(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: In an inspired bit of casting, Will Smith plays John Hancock, a disgraced, alcoholic superhero who gets a much-needed image makeover from an idealistic publicist (Jason Bateman). Peter Berg ("Friday Night Lights") directed this fast-paced action comedy. Charlize Theron, Eddie Marsan, Jae Head(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Thriller about a killer stalking a group of FBI profilers who've gathered for a weekend of training(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this continuation of the epic space opera saga, a downed stormtrooper goes on a journey reconnecting him with heroic faces from the past(n)

programme.title: Traitor
programme.desc: An FBI agent suspects a Muslim ex-US Special Operations officer of being involved with terrorists in this complex espionage thriller(n)

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: A talented yet troubled dancer attempts to turn her life around by focusing on her one true passion, and trains a scrappy young crew to compete against one of the best dance troupes in the country in this high-energy sequel from original Honey director Bille Woodruff. Maria Bennett (Katerina Graham) is in danger of wandering down a dark path when she decides to return to the Bronx, and become a professional dancer. With the support of Honey's mother Connie (Lonette McKee), Maria lands a decent job, and begins training in the same studio where she learned her first moves. Later, eagle eyed volunteer Brandon recognizes Maria's talent, and recruits her to help whip a promising young dance troupe known as the HD's into shape. But temptation soon rears its head in the form of Maria's ex-boyfriend Luis, the leader of the acclaimed 718 crew, and a fierce dancer who doesn't take competition lightly. Recognizing her one true chance to break free of Luis' influence and stay positive, Maria joins the HD's and prepares to go toe-to-toe with reigning champs the 718's on national television. Now if Maria and her underdog crew can just come out on top, she'll finally be able to cut her ties from the past, and follow in the footsteps of her idol Honey(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: This polished caper comedy, based on a Donald E. Westlake novel, pits a professional thief (Martin Lawrence) against the white-collar criminal (Danny DeVito) who stole a prized ring from him. The topnotch supporting cast includes John Leguizamo as Lawrence's partner in crime and comedian Bernie Mac as Lawrence's fence, Uncle Jack. Carmen Ejogo, Glenne Headly, William Fichtner, Larry Miller(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Thriller about a killer stalking a group of FBI profilers who've gathered for a weekend of training(n)

programme.desc: Comedian and impressionist Jay Pharoah performs a stand-up routine from the Cutting Room in New York City(n)

programme.title: The Visitor
programme.desc: Recently widowed economics professor Walter Vale reluctantly agrees to give a lecture in New York. When he arrives in the city, he finds that two illegal immigrants have taken up residence in his little-used Manhattan apartment. An unlikely friendship develops between Walter and his unexpected guests - Syrian Tarek and his African girlfriend Zainab. Walter's previously bland and unfulfilling life is gradually transformed by their influence(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Starts and Stops. In the Season 2 finale, Reggie second-guesses himself about representing Jupiter, but Cam is sure he's made an excellent decision about Allison. Meanshile, a crisis rocks the family(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?

Westlake novel, pits a professional thief (Martin Lawrence) against the white-collar criminal (Danny DeVito) who stole a prized ring from him. programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You Lied To My Face. As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Also spotlighted: Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens; and when Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion(n)

programme.title: The Visitor
programme.desc: Recently widowed economics professor Walter Vale reluctantly agrees to give a lecture in New York. When he arrives in the city, he finds that two illegal immigrants have taken up residence in his little-used Manhattan apartment. An unlikely friendship develops between Walter and his unexpected guests - Syrian Tarek and his African girlfriend Zainab. Walter's previously bland and unfulfilling life is gradually transformed by their influence(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Chiwetel Ejiofor co-star in writer/director David Mamet's martial arts drama Redbelt. Ejiofor plays Mike Terry, a jujitsu master who co-runs a very modest martial arts studio in Los Angeles with his bossy wife, Sondra (Alice Braga). Mike demonstrates an unwavering commitment to his craft and draws a cadre of defiantly loyal pupils including Joe (Max Martini), an LAPD cop. All told, it appears that he has chosen a peaceful and conflict-free path in life. The dedicated martial artist's fate takes an unanticipated turn, however, one evening when a young woman named Laura (Emily Mortimer) bursts into the academy in a state of near hysteria, and reaches for a policeman's gun when he tries to restrain her. One thing leads to another, and before long, Laura is regularly receiving martial arts lessons from Mike. As master begins to teach pupil and his martial arts philosophies emerge, his path also crisscrosses with that of a Hollywood movie star, Chet Frank (Tim Allen), when he saves the fellow from a beating at a local club and gets invited (along with Sondra) to Chet's house for dinner. Chet extends gestures of friendship, and Mike's guard breaks down; he speaks openly and candidly of a special martial arts method he employs that requires one of the participants to "assume a handicap." In time, the association with Chet leads to involvement in the motion-picture industry, and relations with a bevy of characters who aren't exactly what they seem -- including a pay-per-view fight mogul (Ricky Jay) and Chet's slimy and manipulative manager (Joe Mantegna)(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: A killer hip-hop soundtrack backbeats this intense urban drama about gangsters who muscle in on the drug trade in their Philly neighborhood. Things get complicated when they buck up against local crime lords(n)

programme.title: Two Days in April
programme.desc: A documentary look at the NFL draft from the perspective of four college players. Included: the 2006 Senior Bowl; the NFL "combine"; draft weekend(n)

programme.title: Head Games
programme.desc: This thorough, thought-provoking documentary examines the latest scientific data involving brain injuries among athletes. The film includes interviews with coaches, players and sports executives(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You Lied To My Face. As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Also spotlighted: Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens; and when Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion(n)

programme.title: Fresh
programme.desc: New York-set drama about a 12-year-old boy, Fresh, whose life as a school kid and drug runner is turned upside down when one of his friends is inadvertently killed by a local dealer. The youngster sets up a dangerous game, involving all of the local drug kings, to gain his revenge. Samuel L Jackson co-stars as his father, addicted to both alcohol and speed chess(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You Lied To My Face. As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Also spotlighted: Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens; and when Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion(n)

programme.title: Dysfunktional Family
programme.desc: Comedian Eddie Griffin delivers a set of his outrageous standup comedy and introduces his fans to the family who helped inspire his work in this documentary. In DysFunKtional Family, Griffin talks about race, sex, cats, dogs, slavery, terrorism, Michael Jackson, and several of the more eccentric members of his family during a sold-out live show. In between bits, Griffin takes us on a tour of his home town of Kansas City, where we get to meet his mother, who has a remarkable enthusiasm for corporal punishment; his uncle, who discusses his remarkable enthusiasm for pornography; and another uncle, who proved to be an invaluable help to Griffin's early career despite his drug habit and career as a pimp. DysFunKtional Family was directed by George Gallo, who previously worked with Griffin on the comedy Double Take(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: Broad comedy about a financially insecure economics graduate who agrees to participate in a drug trial. The drug in question enhances the subject's senses, and he uses his newly developed powers to get ahead in business. For a while, he enjoys the good life - but then the drug begins to show some unusual side effects(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Blaxploitation spoof in the Airplane! style. Nashawn wins a settlement from an airline and buys his first plane - essentially a winged pimpmobile. With a stoned pilot, raunchy cabin crew and on-board jacuzzi, how could the venture fail to take off?(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: Fresh
programme.desc: New York-set drama about a 12-year-old boy, Fresh, whose life as a school kid and drug runner is turned upside down when one of his friends is inadvertently killed by a local dealer. The youngster sets up a dangerous game, involving all of the local drug kings, to gain his revenge. Samuel L Jackson co-stars as his father, addicted to both alcohol and speed chess(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: A charming cast and beautiful sets bring Natalie Babbitt's kid-lit classic to life. Alexis Bledel stars as Winnie Foster, who encounters a family of immortals while wondering in the woods. William Hurt, Sissy Spacek, Jonathan Jackson, Ben Kingsley, Amy Irving, Victor Garber, Scott Bairstow(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Paul Bettany and Kirsten Dunst pair up for a sporty romcom. A low-ranking British tennis pro finds that his odds improve when he meets an American on the women's circuit(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: The All-American Girls' Professional Baseball League was founded in 1943, when most of the men of baseball-playing age were far away in Europe and Asia fighting World War II. The league flourished until after World War II, when, with the men's return, the league was consigned to oblivion. Director Penny Marshall and screenwriters Lowell Ganz and Babaloo Mandel re-create the wartime era when women's baseball looked to stand a good chance of sweeping the country. The story begins as a candy-bar tycoon enlists agents to scour the country to find women who could play ball. In the backwoods of Oregon, two sisters -- Dottie (Geena Davis) and Kit (Lori Petty) -- are discovered. Dottie can hit and catch, while Kit can throw a mean fastball. The girls come to Chicago to try out for the team with other prospects that include their soon-to-be-teammates Mae Mordabito (Madonna), Doris Murphy (Rosie O'Donnell), and Marla Hooch (Megan Cavanagh). The team's owner, Walter Harvey (Gary Marshall) needs someone to coach his team and he picks one-time home-run champion Jimmy Dugan (Tom Hanks), who is now a broken-down alcoholic. After a few weeks of training, as Dugan sobers up, the team begins to show some promise. By the end of the season, the team has improved to the point where they are competing in the World Series (which is no big deal, since there are only four teams in the league)(n)

programme.title: From Justin to Kelly
programme.desc: Musical romance about a small-town Texan girl who ditches her deadbeat job for a holiday on the beach in Florida. Kelly falls for a party promoter, but her new friend Kaya is secretly plotting to steal him away. The two leads reached the final of reality TV series American Idol(n)

programme.title: Bo on the Go!
programme.desc: Bo and the Picture Snitcher. Bo and Dezzy find the Picture Snitcher to give him a Forever-Changing Painting so he'll stop snatching all the pictures from the castle(n)

programme.title: Busytown Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Litterbug Busters; There Might Be Giants
programme.desc: Litterbug Busters; There Might Be Giants. Huckle searches for a litterbug by using clues found in the litter; some townsfolk believe giant robots are invading the city(n)

programme.title: Doodlebops Rockin' Road Show
programme.desc: Sharesies; Mind Your Manners. The Doodles teach Malcolm to share; Tahlia learns the importance of having manners(n)

programme.title: The Zula Patrol
programme.sub-title: Chili Cook-off; Treasure in the Clouds
programme.desc: Chili Cook-off; Treasure in the Clouds. The team faces a "whirlgoo" of gigantic proportions after Bula freezes a tasty Multo-made meal of galactic goo; Wizzy and Wigg try to find a golden cloud to give Multo after he tells them a story about one(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Abney & Teal
programme.desc: Sky High. Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. They share their home with a group of friendly and hilarious characters. It is extremely windy. Neep has a wonderful time flying through the air on a whirligig. Abney and Teal go to see Bop, who blows a giant bubble for each of them so they can join in. They go higher and higher and higher, which Abney is not too sure about(n)

programme.title: Madeline: Lost in Paris
programme.desc: Plucky Madeline is kidnapped by a man claiming to be her uncle and forced to work in a lace factory. Miss Clavel and all of Madeline's friends search for her as she befriends the other orphan girls working at the factory(n)

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: Ken Kwapis's comedy is set in the swish Majestic Hotel, run by a fierce Faye Dunaway, eagerly awaiting a hotel inspector who may award six-star status. So the manager has to be on topform while coping with his son's insistence there's an orang-utan on the loose. But he's right - master crook Rupert Everett has sneaked the trained ape in to commit a series of audacious burglaries - and once Alexander realises the truth, the only hope is that animal expert Paul Reubens (previously known as Pee Wee Herman) will capture the simian before the inspector realises anything is wrong(n)

programme.title: Bye Bye, Love
programme.desc: Three divorced fathers struggle to bond with their children and to deal with their conflicting emotions about their ex-wives in this comedy drama. Dave and his ex get along pretty well, but since the divorce, he has become a bit of a rake and is loathe to commit to his new girl friend. Donny still pines for his ex, while Vic would like to see his former wife and her new lover die slow, painful deaths. The three men come together to discuss their new and past experiences. Although at first their stories are presented episodically, eventually their multi-layered lives converge on one chaotic night(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: A widower and father of three who also writes a parenting advice column for his local newspaper falls for the girlfriend of his younger brother during a family vacation in director Peter Hedges' offbeat love-triangle laugher. Steve Carell stars as the writer who finds his widely known convictions put to the ultimate test, with Dane Cook and Juliette Binoche respectively assuming the roles of the younger sibling and his radiant girlfriend(n)

programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.desc: Fred and Barney have just got a job at Bedrock Quarry and when they secure a double date with Wilma and Betty, life seems pretty good. Chip Rockefella, a casino owner dreams of a relationship with Wilma himself so he lures the quartet off to Rock Vegas where he can put his plans into action(n)

Catherine Deneuve, Mena Suvari(n)

Killjoys
programme.desc: Necropolis Now. As Johnny faces off with someone from his past, Dutch faces her own personal hell(n)

programme.desc: Built, Not Born. A distress call from the Android's friend, Victor, leads to answers about Two's past(n)

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: Forever Mine Nevermind. Wynonna asks Doc to make an impossible choice. Waverly makes a new friend, and is terrorized by an old one(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Mirror Image. While waiting in a lonely bus station, Millicent Barnes (Vera Miles) is startled to discover that everyone in the station seems to know her. She is further amazed when, peering into the window of a passing bus, she spots a young woman who looks exactly like her. Figuring that Millicent is a mental case, Paul Grinstead (Martin Milner) humors her until the men in the white coats show up -- only to find out that the girl was telling the truth all along. A neat "matte shot" caps this eerie Rod Serling-scripted entry, based, believe it or not, on one of Serling's real-life experiences. First telecast February 26, 1960, "Mirror Image" was the 26th Twilight Zone episode to be filmed, but the 21st to be shown(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: All for Our Country. Conclusion. The investigation into the double homicide turns up two more murders and the evidence leads Grissom, Warrick and Nick to believe a police officer may be involved. Across town, Catherine and Sara probe the death of a college student found after several days in his still-running bathtub. Judge Slater: John Doman. Greg: Eric Szmanda. Robbins: Robert David Hall(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Homebodies. The mummified body of an old woman is found in the victim's closet. It was clearly no accident, and the woman was clearly alive when she was entombed. As Grissom (William L. Petersen) investigates, other CSI members look into a case involving a break-in, a teenaged girl, and a rape -- a case that has more in common with the aforementioned death of the old woman than first meets the eye. Likewise linked are two separate investigations conducted by Catherine (Marg Helgenberger) and Warrick (Gary Dourdan), both involving the same weapon(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Feeling the Heat. Catherine investigates the death of a baby who was left inside a locked car on a steamy day; Nick and Sara examine a lakeside scene where a young woman's body was found washed ashore; Warrick tries to determine whether a man found dead in a sweltering house was the victim of an accident or foul play. Sophia: Ryan Starr. Linda: Stacy Edwards. Mark: Cam Gigandet. Stone: Rick Ravanello. Morris: James Leo Ryan. Evelyn: Paula Newsome(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Fur and Loathing. Grissom and Catherine investigate a bizarre case in which a man dressed in a full-body raccoon suit is shot and then hit by a car along a dark stretch of highway. The woman driving the car is also killed when an 18-wheeler smashes into her vehicle. In town, Sara and Nick look into the murder of a man found shot and frozen in a warehouse's walk-in freezer(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Jackpot. Grissom goes on a solo murder investigation that begins with a head being delivered to his office. Catherine receives what she thinks is hush money from her father, Sam Braun(n)

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: Paul Walker and Steve Zahn star in this well-paced thriller as two brothers whose road trip goes terribly awry. When a seemingly harmless prank backfires, the siblings become the prey of a psychotic truck driver on a highway to hell. Leelee Sobieski, Jessica Bowman, Brian Leckner, Jim Beaver. John Dahl "(Red Rock West") directed(n)

programme.title: Joy Ride 2: Dead Ahead
programme.desc: Closing this year's FrightFest Season is this horror sequel from director Louis Morneau. Betrothed couple Bobby and Melissa are driving across the States to get hitched in Las Vegas. In the car with them are Melissa's sister Kayla and her new boyfriend Nik. Their plans wobble when they break down in the desert, but pick up again when they find a roadworthy car they can 'borrow' to continue their journey. Unfortunately for them, someone has spotted them taking the car. Worse, that person is the sadistic, psychopathic trucker Rusty Nail. Now it's not a question of whether the friends will make it to Vegas, but whether or not they'll live to recount a blood-soaked tale of survival..(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: This lowbrow hit about the Bundys, TV's first family of raunch, made the new Fox network a player. The long-running series prospered despite threats of sponsor boycotts and the ire of some critics, who objected to the show's offbeat, sometimes coarse humor. TV Guide's reviewer, however, applauded the sharp, funny lines, calling the series an antidote to the 'hundreds of sugary [sitcoms] that have rolled blandly across American screens since the beginning of television time.'(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.sub-title: Guess Who's Coming to Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
programme.desc: Guess Who's Coming to Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner. Married. . .With Children opens its tenth season as Bud (David Faustino) moves out of the Bundy household. Dad Al (Ed O'Neill) is delighted that he'll have one less mouth to feed--or at least, he was delighted until he found out that Bud was moving into the Bundy basement. As for Bud's former room, it is now occupied in every sense of the word by Peg's (Katey Sagal) overbearing mom (played by a never-seen Kathleen Freeman), prompting Al to head to Wanker county in hopes of persuading Peg's dad Ephraim (Tim Conway) to reconcile with his wife(n)

But Death must take a forced holiday when he sprains his ankle chasing Peter, who has no desire to go gently into that good night. programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is an elite member of the world's most highly trained force but when he is assigned to protect five out-of-control children of an assassinated scientist, he's truly a SEAL out of water. Replacing his arsenal of wetsuits and weapons with nappies and dummies, Shane must battle a deceptive enemy and wrangle teen rebel Zoe, 8 year-old Ninja wannabe Lulu, and an off-beat Romanian nanny. While drop zones and destroying enemy targets come naturally to Shane, he has no idea what tough really is until he pits his courage against nappies and nurseries(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Kryptonite. In the second episode, Coach moves out of the flat and Winston, who's been on a two-year stint as a basketball coach in Latvia, returns to his old home. Winston, Schmidt and Nick refuse to lend Jess any household items so that she has to go to her ex-boyfriend Spencer's house to collect her belongings. Unfortunately, Jess's trip to Spencer's results in her giving him and Rochelle - the woman with whom he cheated on Jess - a lift to the airport. Undeterred, Nick encourages Jess to stand up to Spencer so that she can move on with her life(n)

programme.title: Angels in the Outfield
programme.desc: This corny baseball movie though aimed at younger audiences can be enjoyed by adults as well. It is an updated and slightly altered version of a 1951 film. Poor Roger is a foster child. His ne'er-do-well has told him that he will be able to bring him home if and when bottom of the leaguers the California Angels win the pennant. The Angels are Roger's favorite team. One night Roger prays for that miracle and lo' an angel appears unto him. Roger is the only one who can see him. By strange coincidence, Roger and his friend J.P. get to meet the Angels manager, a crotchety fellow who after much explanation begins to believe the lad's tale. Soon it's angels helping Angels as the boy's wish begins to come true(n)

programme.title: Kicking & Screaming
programme.desc: Immaturity and poor sportsmanship once again find their firmly established place in children's athletics (at least among the adults) in this sports comedy. Phil Weston (Will Ferrell) is a tightly wound suburban father who had a competitive streak worn into him by his father, Buck (Robert Duvall), who never seemed to feel that his son measured up. When Phil's son joins a Little League soccer team, Phil signs on as coach, only to learn that Buck -- who also has a ten-year-old son these days -- will be coaching a team in the same league. Determined to show his father he can do the job, Phil impresses upon his young charges that winning is the only important thing, and soon gains a few enemies as he humiliates not only the kids on his own team, but their opponents as well. Directed by Jesse Dylan, Kicking & Screaming also features Kate Walsh and legendary football coach Mike Ditka. The screenplay was authored by Steve Rudnick and Leo Benvenuti (The Santa Clause) prior to the latter's death in 2000(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and director Shawn Levy return for more after-hours mayhem in this third outing of the successful Night at the Museum series. When the magic that brings the exhibits to life begins to fade, Larry (Ben Stiller) rallies his historical friends for a trip to London and the adventure of a lifetime. Owen Wilson, Steve Coogan, Ricky Gervais, and Rebel Wilson co-star(n)

McCoy finds himself facing one of their number as the pro se counsel for his friends, arguing for the concept of 'jury nullification', the right of a jury to protect a defendant from an unjust law by finding him not guilty despite the evidence(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Blood. The investigation into an apparent suicide leads to a case involving an adoption, a former spouse, the widower's son, and a person who's been living a lie. Burdett: Stephen Mendillo. Frances: Deborah Rush. O'Brien: Harry O'Reilly. Ryan: Mark Jacoby(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Shadow. A bail bondsman is murdered, and the detectives subsequently haul in a likely perpetrator. Then, an offhand comment made by the suspect leads to irrefutable evidence that a disreputable attorney has been fixing cases for a price. Even more disturbing is the possibility that the attorney's accomplice is a "mole" working within the New York City legal system -- and maybe in the offices of the DA himself(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Burned. An answering machine message leads Briscoe and Curtis to reopen an investigation into an arson attack that killed a girl - but the 15-year-old suspect has a powerful ally in his grandfather, an influential force in political spheres(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Ritual. The planned circumcision of a couple's daughter (Emmy Rossun) leads to a rift between the American father and the Egyptian mother and then to a killing. Martin: Cotter Smith. Rina: Ava Haddad. Cahill: Steve Landesberg. Mrs. Newman: Abby Lewis. Briscoe: Jerry Orbach(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Under the Influence. A drunken driver kills three people and is charged with first-degree murder in a case that causes strong disagreements between McCoy and Ross(n)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: PGA Championship third-round play. Third-round play in the PGA Championship at Quail Hollow Club in Charlotte(n)

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival(n)

programme.title: Tron: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam Flynn gets sucked into the same virtual world where his father has been trapped for 20 years, and together the pair attempt to escape their dangerous environment in this visually stunning sequel(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Michael Bay's all-action adventure, based on the popular toy. Earth becomes the battleground between the good Transformers (Autobots) and the bad (Decepticons), who are searching for the all-powerful Allspark, which could destroy humanity. Caught up in the middle is Sam Witwicky, whose beaten-up old car turns out to be an Autobot called Bumblebee. The duo hold the key to the battle that rages between the Decepticons and the government forces, led by Sgt Lennonx, but can they stop the evil Megatron?(n)

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: Bats**t. Bryce wrongly accuses Dr. Ken of a crime, and Desna and Jennifer may be Dr. Ken's only hope. Also: Dean sees a disturbing billboard ad, leaving Desna to deal with the fallout; Virginia and Desna must go to Polly for help when Desna's past haunts her(n)

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: Self-Portrait. The ladies go to their fancy new salon for the first time, but they aren't met with the kindness of strangers. Also, the women decide to compete in a nail-design battle; Virginia seeks life's finer things; and Jennifer discovers an agonizing secret(n)

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: Escape. The aftermath of a nail competition finds Desna having hope that she can escape Uncle Daddy's grasp. Also, Jennifer struggles knowing Desna's dark secret; Polly discovers her maternal instincts; and Dean may have found his first spark of romantic love(n)

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: Teatro. A shocking revelation impacts the crew, and Jennifer finds unforeseen solace in her square-dancing instructor. Also, Polly uses her powers of bad for good; Quiet Ann faces a big decision; and scary times loom for Virginia and Desna(n)
